setDetails.setDescription:
The TokenDAO Core Polygon Portfolio (TCORP) is a strategy providing lower-cost, long-term core exposure to the performance of the overall cryptocurrency market deployed on the Polygon blockchain.

Objective
The TokenDAO Core Polygon Portfolio is a strategy designed to track the overall performance of the Layer-1 (base network) cryptocurrency market. The portfolio is weighted based on a combination of capitalization weighting, equal weighting, and portfolio optimization algorithms. The TokenDAO Core Polygon Portfolio aims to be a core holding within any diversified cryptocurrency portfolio.

Token Inclusion Criteria
The token must be representative of a Layer-1 blockchain or sidechain. The token must have a tradable ERC-20 token representation on the Polygon blockchain and can be in any form if there exist adequate liquidity available, reasonable transaction costs, and low tracking error. Tokens with low liquidity, high transaction costs, or high tracking error are excluded. The token must not be considered a security by corresponding authorities across different jurisdictions.

Rebalancing
Rebalancing follows a percent-range rebalancing approach that involves setting rebalancing thresholds or trigger points, stated as a percentage of the portfolio’s value, around target values. This approach is intended to keep turnover and network fees low. Rebalanced weightings are computed using a combination of capitalization weighting, equal weighting, and portfolio optimization algorithms.
setDetails.managerDescription: TokenDAO is a decentralized autonomous organization for the management of smart contracts. TokenDAO’s mission is the prudent management of smart contracts with a focus on investment management.
